name: assistant.threads.setSuggestedPrompts
desc: Set suggested prompts for the given assistant thread

channel_id.desc: Channel ID containing the assistant thread.

prompts.desc: Each prompt should be supplied with its `title` and `message` attribute.

thread_ts.desc: Message timestamp of the thread to set suggested prompts for.

title.desc: Title for the list of provided prompts. For example: Suggested Prompts, Related Questions.

errors.channel_not_found: Error returned when given an invalid channel_id
errors.message_not_found: Error returned when given an invalid message
